////---- Tests for  ClassTemplateTest_AbstractClassInheritance ----/////

test Teacher {

 generate JUnit ;
 
 depend  Person,Student,Teacher ; 



 
 GIVEN:
 ClassTemplateTest_AbstractClassInheritance.ump;
 
 
 
 THEN:
  //tests for :position

      test attribute_position {
    
      
        Teacher aTeacher("RandomString1");
        
        
    assertTrue( aTeacher.setPosition("RandomString1"));
    assertTrue( aTeacher.getPosition() =="RandomString1");
    assertTrue( aTeacher.setPosition("RandomString2"));
    assertTrue( aTeacher.getPosition()=="RandomString2");
    assertFalse( aTeacher.getPosition() =="RandomString1");
             
          
        	}


  
 
   

}
